Uses of Class
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.NonharmonicSinusoidalSpeechFrame

Packages that use NonharmonicSinusoidalSpeechFrame
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal Sinusoidal analysis/synthesis framework supporting various approaches:
Conventional sinusoidal analysis/modification/synthesis Harmonic plus Noise Model (HNM) based analysis/modification/synthesis Multiresolution sinusoidal analysis/modification/snythesis - Warning: This is a very basic implementation and it does not work properly!
Sines+transients+noise based analysis/modification/synthesis
 
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.pitch Pitch and voicing analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.
Pitch detection does not work properly.
Therefore, we use HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer for maximum frequency of voicing dteection only and get the f0 values from another pitch detector.
 
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.pitch Experimental pitch tracker using the comb filter approach for sinusoidal models.
This algorithm does not work well so we use other pitch detectors in Mary.
